mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ST_WITH_BOARD VALUES (ST_WITH_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{WITH_BOARD_WRITER}, #{WITH_BOARD_TITLE}, #{WITH_BOARD_CONTENT}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'RR-MM-DD')||'-'||#{WITH_BOARD_APPLY_NO}||'-'|| LTRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(0, 999)),'000')), #{WITH_BOARD_APPLY_NO}, 1, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ST_WITH_BOARD ORDER BY WITH_BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM ST_WITH_BOARD_SUB ORDER BY WITH_BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ST_WITH_BOARD WHERE WITH_BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR WITH_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select * from ST_WITH_BOARD where WITH_BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{word}||'%' OR WITH_BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' order by WITH_BOARD_NO desc
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_WITH_BOARD_SUB SET WITH_BOARD_NOW_ID = #{WITH_BOARD_NOW_ID}, WITH_BOARD_NOW_NO = WITH_BOARD_NOW_NO + 1, WITH_BOARD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE WITH_BOARD_NO = #{WITH_BOARD_NO}
